actions.description: The redcap makes three Wicked Sickle attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Wicked Sickle

actions.description: The redcap moves up to its speed to a creature it can see and kicks with its iron boots. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 20 (3d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.
actions.name: Ironbound Pursuit

specialTraits.description: The redcap has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.
specialTraits.name: Iron Boots

specialTraits.description: While grappling, the redcap is considered to be Medium. Also, wielding a heavy weapon doesn't impose disadvantage on its attack rolls.
specialTraits.name: Outsize Strength
